quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
author: Buddha

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

quote: You only lose what you cling to.
author: Buddha

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Hatred does not cease through hatred at any time. Hatred ceases through love. This is an unalterable law.
author: Buddha

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
author: Buddha

quote: In the end, these things matter most: How well did you love? How fully did you live? How deeply did you let go?
author: Buddha

quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
author: Buddha

quote: If you light a lamp for someone, it will also brighten your path.
author: Buddha

quote: Meditate. Live purely. Be quiet. Do your work with mastery. Like the moon, come out from behind the clouds! Shine.
author: Buddha

quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Buddha

quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
author: Buddha

quote: True love is born from understanding.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
author: Buddha

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha
